title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, there is a discrepancy in the format displayed between the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
OB: Currently, when a datetime value is retrieved and displayed in a dynamic text item or data/text item, the format shown does not match.
EB: The expected behavior is that the datetime values retrieved from the table should display in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item on a page. 
2. Set all three items to retrieve and display a datetime value from a table. 
3. Compare the format of the datetime value displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
